instruction: Please open LibreOffice Writer using HOTKEY Alt+F2 then type libreoffice --writer then press HOTKEY ENTER. Once the app is open type the text "A+" into a new blank document.

command: import pyautogui; import time; pyautogui.click(960, 540); time.sleep(0.5);

single-action: `CLICK` LibreOffice Writer icon on the left Dock
`CLICK` inside the blank document editing area once Writer has opened
grouped-action: `CLICK` LibreOffice Writer icon on the left Dock
`CLICK` inside the blank document editing area once Writer has opened
